response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $1,200,000 to you, and I understand its importance to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $950,000. This offer represents a unique chance to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further with you and believe this could be a mutually beneficial arrangement. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 950000}
